ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
ygData.msgSnippet: Sneak allows you to move soundlessly.  This greatly reduces your agro radius in relation to hostile mobs. So much that you can stand directly behind a KoS mob
ygData.messageBody:
Sneak allows you to move soundlessly. This greatly reduces your agro radius
in relation to hostile mobs. So much that you can stand directly behind a
KoS mob and not be attacked. Sneak is great for breaking into Hate and
getting to the safe SW corner. Ever time I have used it I have safely made
the corner, even one time having a Cleric of Inny run 30-40 feet in front of
me.

Hide allows you to well, hide. Basicly a manaless invis the is broken when
you move.

There are no success messages for either skill. Sneak is easy as you slow
down to a crawl. Hide you need to target an non-indiffernent mob then con
it after hiding. If it cons indifferent you are hidden.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 2:11 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!


From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>

We've probably been over this like a million times but well this time I"ll
pay attention...

Our skill cap on forage was obviously 40 (yick, so low)

What is it on:
Sneak
Hide

and what's the difference between those two?

Tani/Halana
Solusek Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Corey de Danann [mailto:corey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 3:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Forage gets better!


From: "Corey de Danann" <corey@...>

Hey all! Good news for those us who like the Forage skill! I was happily
running along today hitting my forage button as I always do, when I go the
message: You have become better at Forage (41). Yippeee. They have raised
the skill cap on forage. I had to log out before I found out what the max
was, but I thought I'd pass that along to you all.


Llyrean Daoine'Sidhe
Bard of the 23rd Ballad, on E'ci
